item.title: Emacs - Disable creation of lockfiles per project
item.description: To disable lockfiles on Emacs project add this into .dir-locals.el ((nil (create-lockfiles . nil) )) This can be very useful when working on CRA or Expo that watch for file changes and throw errors when the lock files are found and it attempts to read them, even though they are just symlinks.

item.title: Syncing EteSync CalDav calendars into Spacemacs and OrgMode
item.description: Add additional packages dotspacemacs-additional-packages '( org-caldav ) Configuring your Calendars (setq org-caldav-url "http://127.0.0.1:37358/rob@robertplant.io") (setq org-caldav-calendar-id "calendarId") (setq org-caldav-check-dav "http://127.0.0.1:37358/rob@robertplant.io") (setq org-caldav-inbox "~/org/Calendar.org") (setq org-icalendar-timezone "Europe/London") (setq org-icalendar-date-time-format ";TZID=%Z:%Y%m%dT%H%M%S") Login via the EteSync frontend Log in via the frontend
